short_summary: Procurement of HD9 Mercury vapor Lamp
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre, Dame St E., Montreal, QC, Canada, H1N 2E9, no later than 31 March 2024.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Procurement of Mercury Vapor Lamps
#### Procurement Reference Number: CB-336-39991064
#### Amendment Number: 7
#### Solicitation Number: W8485-247891

**Procurement Details:**
* Tender Closing Date: December 12, 2023 at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 9, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

**Contracting Entity:**
* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
* Contact:
	+ Name: Joseph Catanzariti
	+ Email: joseph.catanzariti@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (819) 939-4271

**Notice Type:**
* Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:**
* Competitive - Open bidding

**Trade Agreements:**
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
* North America

**Delivery Location:**
* Montreal, Quebec, Canada

**Procurement Description:**

The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit proposals for the procurement of mercury vapor lamps. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the items listed below to the Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre Dame St E., Montreal, QC, Canada, H1N 2E9 by March 31, 2024.

* Item 1: Mercury Vapor Lamps (GSIN: N6240, NSN: 6240-17-129-4737)
	+ Quantity: 120 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each

**Submission Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit their proposals in either English or French, the two official languages of Canada.
* The proposals must include a Certificate of Conformance from the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) for the proposed product.
* Bidders may propose an Equivalent or Substitute Product, which must be clearly identified and supported by documentation.

**Crown Rights:**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: December 12, 2023 at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 9, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 202
